title: Twitter hacker and crypto scammer receives 5-year prison sentence
description: On Friday, Joseph James O’Conner was given a five-year prison term for his role in the 2020 Twitter hack by a federal court. title: SEC Puts Investors First: Waives $30M BlockFi Penalty to Expedite Repayment
